Ghoul.title: Ghoul
Ghoul.description: Representa um Ghoul, um tipo especial de lutador do Mundo 17.

maxLevel.description: Nível máximo para conquistas de progressão.

progressionBonus.description: Descrição do bônus de progressão (ex: '5% de energia a cada lvl').

tiers.description: Níveis específicos para conquistas de raid.

SavedAnswer.title: SavedAnswer
SavedAnswer.description: Represents a saved AI-generated answer for later use.

id.description: Unique identifier for the saved answer.

userId.description: Reference to the User who saved this answer. (Relationship: User 1:N SavedAnswer)

question.description: The original question asked to the AI.

answer.description: The AI-generated answer that was saved.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the answer was saved.

WikiContent.title: WikiContent
WikiContent.description: Represents a page or article from the Anime Eternal Wiki, either from Fandom or a custom in-app wiki.

id.description: Unique identifier for the wiki content.

title.description: The title of the wiki page.

content.description: The main content of the wiki page (e.g., text, HTML).

source.description: Indicates the source of the wiki content (e.g., 'Fandom', 'In-App').

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp indicating when the wiki content was last updated.

ContentSuggestion.title: ContentSuggestion
ContentSuggestion.description: Represents a suggestion made by a user for new or updated content for the Wiki.

id.description: Unique identifier for the content suggestion.

userId.description: Reference to the User who made the suggestion. (Relationship: User 1:N ContentSuggestion)

title.description: Suggested title for the new/updated content.

content.description: The suggested content itself (e.g., text, description).

status.description: The current status of the suggestion (e.g., 'pending', 'approved', 'rejected').

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the suggestion was made.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Eternal Guide app.

tag.description: An optional tag for special user roles, like 'admin'.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

birthday.description: The user's birthday in MM-DD format.

reputationPoints.description: Points awarded to a user for helpful feedback.

credits.description: F2P currency earned from achievements, used for Gamepasses.

aiResponsePreference.description: User's preference for AI response style.

aiLanguage.description: User's preferred language for AI responses.

userTitle.description: An honorific title the user wants the AI to use (e.g., Mestre, Campeão).

customName.description: A custom name the user wants the AI to call them.

following.description: A list of user IDs that this user is following.

dungeonSettings.description: User preferences for dungeon finder messages.

alwaysSendLink.description: If true, always send the server link in /soling posts.

deleteAfterMinutes.description: Automatically delete the soling post after this many minutes.

weaponSlots.description: Stores the equipped weapons in the three slots.

jewelrySlots.description: Stores the equipped jewelry in the four slots.

DungeonRequest.title: DungeonRequest
DungeonRequest.description: Stores a user's request for help or to host a dungeon.

userId.description: The Discord ID of the user making the request.

username.description: The Discord username of the user.

avatarUrl.description: The URL of the user's Discord avatar.

type.description: Whether the user is seeking help or hosting.

raidName.description: The name of the raid for the request.

messageId.description: The ID of the message posted in the soling channel.

confirmedUsers.description: A list of users who confirmed they will help.

UserWeapon.title: UserWeapon
UserWeapon.description: Represents a weapon equipped by a user, including its evolution and enchantments.

evolutionLevel.description: The star level of the weapon (0-3).

UserJewelry.title: UserJewelry
UserJewelry.description: Represents a piece of jewelry equipped by a user.

type.description: The type of bonus the jewelry provides.

UserItem.title: UserItem
UserItem.description: Represents a generic item a user has on their profile, like a power, aura, or tier.

leveling.description: O nível de 'leveling' de um poder, se aplicável.

UserAccessory.title: UserAccessory
UserAccessory.description: Represents an accessory that a user has equipped/owns, including its rarity.

UserGamepass.title: UserGamepass
UserGamepass.description: Represents a gamepass that a user owns.

World.title: World
World.description: Represents one of the 21 worlds in the game.

name.description: The name of the world (e.g., 'World 20 - Grand Elder').

Power.title: Power
Power.description: Represents a gacha or progression power within a world.

name.description: Name of the power set (e.g., 'Grand Elder Power').

statType.description: The primary stat this power affects. 'mixed' indicates multiple types of boosts.

maxLevel.description: The maximum level for a progression power.

maxBoost.description: The maximum boost for a single-stat progression power.

unlockCost.description: The cost in coins to unlock this power for rolling or progression.

leveling.description: Details about the leveling system for a gacha power.

token.description: The name of the token used for leveling.

costPerLevel.description: The number of tokens required for each level-up.

description.description: A brief description of the leveling mechanic.

boosts.description: An array of boosts for mixed progression powers.

PowerStat.title: PowerStat
PowerStat.description: Represents an individual stat or level for a power.

name.description: Name of the stat level (e.g., 'Sleeping Power', 'Second Form').

rarity.description: The rarity of the gacha roll (e.g., 'Phantom', 'Supreme').

probability.description: The probability of getting this roll.

statType.description: The stat this specific level affects, for mixed gacha powers.

energy_crit_bonus.description: The energy critical hit chance bonus (e.g., '1.00%').

NPC.title: NPC
NPC.description: Represents a non-player character in a world.

exp.description: Experience points dropped by the NPC.

world.description: The world where the NPC is located.

videoUrl.description: An optional URL to a video showing the location of the NPC.

drops.description: Details about the items dropped by the NPC.

Pet.title: Pet
Pet.description: Represents a companion pet in a world.

energy_bonus.description: The energy bonus provided by the pet.
The energy bonus provided by the avatar.

Dungeon.title: Dungeon
Dungeon.description: Represents a dungeon within a world.

Accessory.title: Accessory
Accessory.description: Represents a wearable accessory. They can be dropped by a specific NPC boss or obtained as a reward from a Raid.

rank.description: The rank of the boss that drops the accessory (e.g., 'S-Rank', 'SS-Rank').

bonuses.description: An array of different bonus types the accessory can provide.

valuesByRarity.description: A list of bonus values, explicitly linked to their rarity.

Shadow.title: Shadow
Shadow.description: Represents a Shadow fighter, a special type of fighter dropped by bosses from World 6 onwards.

name.description: The name of the Shadow, usually tied to the boss that drops it.

type.description: The type of bonus the Shadow provides.

rank.description: The boss rank that drops this stat version (e.g., 'Rank SS', 'Rank SSS').

cooldown.description: The attack cooldown, applicable only to Damage Shadows (e.g., '2s').

Stand.title: Stand
Stand.description: Represents a Stand fighter, a special type of fighter from World 16.

Obelisk.title: Obelisk
Obelisk.description: Representa um obelisco especial em um mundo que fornece bônus de status.

GameMetadata.title: GameMetadata
GameMetadata.description: Stores metadata about the game data version.

version.description: A version string, e.g., '1.0.1'. Incremented on data changes.

lastUpdatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last data update.

NegativeFeedback.title: NegativeFeedback
NegativeFeedback.description: Stores a user's negative feedback on an AI response for admin review. Can be in a top-level collection or a user's subcollection.

userId.description: ID of the user who gave feedback.

negativeResponse.description: The AI response that was marked as negative.

aiSuggestion.description: An AI-generated suggestion on how to improve the response.

reputationPointsAwarded.description: Points the AI suggests awarding for this feedback.

status.description: The review status of the feedback.

reviewedBy.description: The email of the admin who reviewed the feedback.

AchievementProgress.title: AchievementProgress
AchievementProgress.description: Stores the user's selected level for various general achievements.

friends-bonus.description: Selected level for Friends Bonus V.

total-coins.description: Selected level for Total coins XXVIII.

total-energy.description: Selected level for Total energy XLV.

time-played.description: Selected level for Time Played X.

star-opened.description: Selected level for Star opened X.

total-enemies.description: Selected level for Total Enemies XIX.

definition.description: Stores game achievements.
Stores user requests for dungeon help or hosting.
Stores user profile information.
Stores AI-generated answers saved by the user.
Stores the items a user has.
Stores the items a user has.
Stores the items a user has.
Stores the items a user has.
Stores user-owned accessories and their rarities.
Stores user-owned gamepasses.
Stores the user's index tiers.
Stores the items a user has.
Stores the items a user has.
Stores the user's selected level for general achievements.
Stores content suggestions made by the user for the Wiki.
A user-specific copy of their negative feedback for display in their profile.
A global collection for all negative AI response feedback for admin review.
Stores general wiki articles. This is for high-level guides, not detailed game data.
A singleton document to track game data version for cache invalidation.
Top-level collection for each game world.
Sub-collection for powers available in a world.
The individual levels and stats for a specific power.
Sub-collection for NPCs found in a world.
Sub-collection for pets available in a world.
Sub-collection for dungeons located in a world.
Sub-collection for accessories available in a world.
Sub-collection for Shadow fighters available in a world.
Sub-collection for Stand fighters available in a world.
Sub-collection for Ghoul fighters available in a world.
Sub-collection for special Obelisks available in a world.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is organized with 'worlds' as the top-level collection to logically separate game content. Each world document contains sub-collections for 'powers', 'npcs', 'pets', 'dungeons', 'accessories', 'shadows' and 'stands', creating a hierarchical and scalable data model. This allows for efficient querying of specific game data. For example, to get all shadows for 'World 7', you query the '/worlds/world7/shadows' sub-collection. A new top-level collection 'achievements' is added to store all game achievements, which is separate from world-specific data.
